data.introduce:
国内BOP自动出票服务(AirDemandBOPTicket)为用户提供了集运价校验，运价存储，EI存储，德付通支付，出票，票面显示等多功能为一体的自动出票服务。
对应主机指令PAT:A、SFC、ETDZ等指令。
data.business:
国内运价计算、存储、德付通支付、出票。
支持无运价PNR运价计算存储出票操作和含有运价的PNR价格校验和自动出票操作。
data.functions:
支持包含多种旅客类型出票；
支持PNR中的全部旅客出票。
支持出票航段状态校验。可以限制只有RR、HK、DK、TK、KL、KK状态的航段才允许出票。
支持用户输入EI信息。如果PNR中没有EI，则将用户输入的EI写入PNR；如果PNR中有EI，则忽略用户输入的EI。
支持大客户编码。
支持PNR中只有部分旅客运价的出票场景。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空出票请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"零售商信息：？出票Office号和打票机号","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？出票Office号","children":[]},{"name":"@OtherID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"DemandTicketDetail","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票请求信息","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"PNR信息","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客运价类型：与旅客类型一致","children":[]}]},{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"ID标识：PNR:ID是PNR号；","children":[]}]},{"name":"Endorsement","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[{"name":"@Info","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客信息：如果不填，则默认对该pnr的所有旅客进行出票。如果填写了，则必须填写pnr中所有旅客(德付通支持针对PNR出票，暂不支持部分旅客出票)。","children":[{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名：旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"@PassengerRefNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客序号：旅客在pnr中的序号。如果不填写，则不验证输入的序号。","children":[]},{"name":"@PassengerTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型：出票旅客类型，ADT-成人，CHD-儿童，INF-婴儿，JC-因类型。公带伤警察，GM-伤残军人.默认是成人。如果是非成人，请填写对应的旅客（如果输入类型错误，会使用默认值ADT）, AB-特殊旅客类型（如需出此类型客票，旅客信息必输）","children":[]}]},{"name":"AdditionalSegmentInfos","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航段信息集合","children":[{"name":"AdditionalSegmentInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"@FlightRefNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段序号：航段序号，必须是两位，如01","children":[]},{"name":"@FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段指定FareBasisCode","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PTC_FareBreakdowns","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价信息：当pnr中有运价，则不用填写运价信息。","children":[{"name":"PTC_FareBreakdown","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"PTC运价明细","children":[{"name":"PassengerTypeQuantity","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客运价类型","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客类型代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"FareBasisCodes","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价基础信息","children":[{"name":"FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价基础信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"PassengerFare","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客运价","children":[{"name":"TotalFare","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总价信息（包含税费等）","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"BaseFare","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总价信息：不包含税费","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"金额：金额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码：货币代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"Taxes","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税费信息","children":[{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税费代码：税费代码","children":[{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税费代码：税费代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"WholePNRPrice","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"取值Y/N；如果设置为Y，则表示要进行PNR整单计算运价，此时不带旅客序号；如果设置为N，则默认按现在逻辑处理。默认N","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketingCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"指定出票航司","children":[]},{"name":"@ReconfirmSegmentInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否做RR：如果为true，则做RR；false，则不做RR","children":[]},{"name":"@ReturnTicketInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否返回票面信息：如果为true，则返回票面信息；false，则不返回","children":[]},{"name":"@LimitSegmentStatusInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否限制航段状态：如果为true，则限制出票的航段状态；false，则不限制","children":[]},{"name":"@EtryInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否尝试重出票：如果为true,则失败后尝试重出票；否则不做重出票","children":[]},{"name":"@DPayPassword","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"德付通支付密码","children":[]},{"name":"@DpayIgnoreTkne","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否忽略含有TKNE的旅客继续出票：若为true则继续出票，否则抛出异常(由于德付通对含有TKNE项的旅客不再进行支付，所以需要用户选择是否继续这种场景的出票)","children":[]}]},{"name":"@SubscribeTicketInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"客票订阅订阅：是否客票订阅true 为订阅，false为不订阅 默认为false","children":[]},{"name":"@SubscribeFltInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"航班变动订阅：是否订阅航班变更数据，默认为false（注：空字符串SubscribeFltInd=\"\"为false）","children":[]},{"name":"@SeqenceType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"价格显示排序方式：可以填L\"/\"H\"表示价格从低至高显示/从高到低显示，当无此选项查询时报运价过多\"发现太多记录 - 请缩小查询范围\"时可填","children":[]},{"name":"@PriceAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"显示价格的条数：当无此选项查询时报运价过多\"发现太多记录 - 请缩小查询范围\"时可填，需跟上面参数结合","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirDemandTicketRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空出票响应信息","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出票成功：自动出票是否成功，成功返回OK","children":[]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司两字码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细 信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细 信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketItemInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"票面信息","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"@PassengerTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期和时间","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号：不含航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票状态","children":[]},{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"@TotalAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票面总金额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]},{"name":"@PaymentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付方式","children":[]},{"name":"@Endorsement","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"？：？","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细 信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细 信息","children":[]}]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ SeqenceType='L' PriceAmount="3" >
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187" OtherID="7">
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <DemandTicketDetail ReconfirmSegmentInd="true" ReturnTicketInfoInd="true" LimitSegmentStatusInd="true" DPayPassword="123456" DpayIgnoreTkne="true">
        <BookingReferenceID ID="JV7PET" ID_Context="PNR"></BookingReferenceID>
        <Endorsement Info="不得退改签"></Endorsement>
        <PTC_FareBreakdowns>
            <PTC_FareBreakdown>
                <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT" />
                <FareBasisCodes>
                    <FareBasisCode>Y10+HWMY</FareBasisCode>
                </FareBasisCodes>
                <PassengerFare>
                    <TotalFare Amount="1560.00" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    <BaseFare Amount="1180.00" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    <Taxes>
                        <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="100.00" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                        <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="280.00" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    </Taxes>
                </PassengerFare>
            </PTC_FareBreakdown>
        </PTC_FareBreakdowns>
    </DemandTicketDetail>
</OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ>

<OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191" OtherID="15"></Source>
    </POS>
    <DemandTicketDetail ReconfirmSegmentInd="true" ReturnTicketInfoInd="true" LimitSegmentStatusInd="true" DPayPassword="159753">
        <BookingReferenceID ID="JS119B" ID_Context="PNR"></BookingReferenceID>
        <Endorsement Info="不得退改签"></Endorsement>
        <PTC_FareBreakdowns>
            <PTC_FareBreakdown>
                <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT" />
                <FareBasisCodes>
                    <FareBasisCode>Y+Y</FareBasisCode>
                </FareBasisCodes>
                <PassengerFare>
                    <TotalFare Amount="2140.0" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    <BaseFare Amount="1760" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    <Taxes>
                        <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="100.0" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                        <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="280" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    </Taxes>
                </PassengerFare>
            </PTC_FareBreakdown>
        </PTC_FareBreakdowns>
    </DemandTicketDetail>
</OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ>

		<PassengerName PassengerTypeCode="ADT">
			<Surname>ZHOU/XIAO</Surname>
		</PassengerName>
		<FlightSegment DepartureDateTime="2016-06-16T10:55:00" FlightNumber="1832" TicketStatus="OPEN FOR USE" ResBookDesigCode="Y">
			<DepartureAirport LocationCode="SHA"/>
			<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="PEK"/>
			<MarketingAirline Code="CA"/>
		</FlightSegment>
		<FlightSegment DepartureDateTime="2016-06-19T06:25:00" FlightNumber="6412" TicketStatus="OPEN FOR USE" ResBookDesigCode="Y">
			<DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK"/>
			<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="SHA"/>
			<MarketingAirline Code="CZ"/>
		</FlightSegment>
	</TicketItemInfo>
</OTA_AirDemandTicketRS>

qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191" OtherID="15">
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <DemandTicketDetail ReconfirmSegmentInd="true" ReturnTicketInfoInd="true" LimitSegmentStatusInd="true" RollbackInd="true" DPayPassword="159753" DpayIgnoreTkne="true">
        <BookingReferenceID ID="HPKX9D" ID_Context="PNR"></BookingReferenceID>
        <Endorsement Info="不得退改签"></Endorsement>
        <PTC_FareBreakdowns>
            <PTC_FareBreakdown>
                <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT" />
                <FareBasisCodes>
                    <FareBasisCode>ZHANGYUN</FareBasisCode>
                </FareBasisCodes>
                <PassengerFare>
                    <TotalFare Amount="1190.0" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    <BaseFare Amount="1000.0" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    <Taxes>
                        <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                        <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="140.0" CurrencyCode="CNY" />
                    </Taxes>
                </PassengerFare>
            </PTC_FareBreakdown>
        </PTC_FareBreakdowns>
    </DemandTicketDetail>
</OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ>

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 指定大客户编码设置WholePNRPrice为Y.xml
qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191" OtherID="51">
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <DemandTicketDetail ReconfirmSegmentInd="true" ReturnTicketInfoInd="true" LimitSegmentStatusInd="true"
                         DPayPassword="159753">
        <BookingReferenceID ID="HR3W64" ID_Context="PNR">
            <CompanyName Code="9CN03108"/>
        </BookingReferenceID>
        <Endorsement Info="不得退改签"/>
        <PaymentInfo PaymentType="CASH" CurrencyCode="CNY" Amount="2470.00"/>
        <PassengerName PassengerRefNumber="1" PassengerTypeCode="ADT">
            <Surname>ZHOU/XIAO</Surname>
        </PassengerName>
        <PassengerName PassengerRefNumber="1" PassengerTypeCode="INF">
            <Surname>ZHOU/XIAOXIAO</Surname>
        </PassengerName>
        <PTC_FareBreakdowns>
            <PTC_FareBreakdown>
                <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT"/>
                <FareBasisCodes>
                    <FareBasisCode>Y</FareBasisCode>
                </FareBasisCodes>
                <PassengerFare>
                    <TotalFare Amount="2270.00" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    <BaseFare Amount="2150.00" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    <Taxes>
                        <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50.00" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                        <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="70.00" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    </Taxes>
                </PassengerFare>
                <WholePNRPrice>Y</WholePNRPrice>
            </PTC_FareBreakdown>
            <PTC_FareBreakdown>
                <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="INF"/>
                <FareBasisCodes>
                    <FareBasisCode>YIN90</FareBasisCode>
                </FareBasisCodes>
                <PassengerFare>
                    <BaseFare Amount="220.00" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    <Taxes>
                        <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="0.00" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                        <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="0.00" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    </Taxes>
                </PassengerFare>
                <WholePNRPrice>Y</WholePNRPrice>
            </PTC_FareBreakdown>
        </PTC_FareBreakdowns>
    </DemandTicketDetail>
</OTA_AirDemandTicketRQ>
